## A list of some of my data science projects

-   [Predicting Trailhead Parking Fullness at JeffCo Open Space Trailheads](https://github.com/andypicke/JeffCo-OpenSpace-LotSpot-Analysis) : Using a model to predict parking lot usage at [Jefferson County Open Space](https://www.jeffco.us/open-space) trailheads in Colorado.

-   [Journalists Under Fire](https://github.com/andypicke/Journalists-Under-Fire) : An analysis of global threats to journalists and press freedom.
